title: Finance Ministry to reassess current excise levels as OMCs incur heavy losses - Moneycontrol.com
content: Finance Ministry to reassess current excise levels as OMCs incur heavy losses  Moneycontrol.com
description: The discussion has taken place at a time when benchmark Brent crude price has surged past $105 a barrel for the first time since 2014 after Russia's attack on Ukraine exacerbated concerns about disruptions to global energy supply.
